name: Dominion card game (Beta v0.1.2)
description:
A multiplayer Dominion card game.  It includes custom Avatar themed cards I created and playtested extensively with my friends using the physical game.  Includes the expansions Intrigue, Prosperity, Seaside, Alchemy, Cornucopia, and Dark Ages. 

I've been working on this for almost 2 months.  (I know that an official online game already exists, I just made this for fun.)  It's not finished yet.  Currently multiplayer only works between multiple windows on the same computer (you could use duel monitors)  I'm working on getting LAN games working. 

This is the second update to the game.
